Select a Revision, Version Label, or Promotion Group

Use the Select a Revision, Version Label, or Promotion Group dialog box to select a revision, version label, or promotion group for an action. Expand the project tree in the left pane and select a file, then select Show Revisions, Version Labels, or Promotion Groups from the drop-down list to display items for selection.

Field Descriptions

File list If a project, project database, or folder was previously selected, expand the tree to display files and select one. If a versioned file was previously selected, the selected file displays.
Show Revisions/Version Labels/Promotion Groups list Select one of the following to display in the right pane for the selected file: Show Revisions, Show Version Labels, or Show Promotion Groups (if a promotion group is associated with the file).
Revision/Version Label/Promotion Group column Select a revision, version label, or promotion group for the selected file.
